Developer Terms of Use
des:
This educational skill focused on enhancing language proficiency by mastering comparisons of adjectives is designed with two different challenges. One is “Guess the degree” where players must guess the word in its correct degree of comparison. The other is “Toss an adjective” which involves placing the correct form of an adjective in the blank part of the sentence based on the context. The overall framework of the game is designed to help players learn and identify the positive, comparative and superlative form of adjectives. A demo lesson geared towards beginners is available for access anywhere within the game. English learners in all age groups will find this game equally engaging as questions span across varying levels of complexity. The quiz based format makes the overall experience fun and exciting compared to other means of learning.

Once you’ve enabled this app on your Alexa device, just say “Alexa, open Adjective Tutor” and use the following commands:

To choose a game level, say:
“Guess the degree” or “Toss an adjective”

To switch from one game to another, say:
“Change level”

To get a lesson on adjectives, say:
“Learn about adjectives”

To understand the rules of the game, say “help”.

To erase your progress and get a fresh start, say:
“Reset the game”
